## DecoratedRecordClass type

A class that act as wrapper for record properties

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type DecoratedRecordClass<Props, Data = Props> = {
    new (input: Props | Data): RecordClass<Props, Data> & Readonly<Props>;
};
```
<b>References:</b> [RecordClass](./paratype.recordclass.md)
